## Configuration Already in Place

### Backend Ruff Configuration (`/home/pbrown/Novus-db/backend/pyproject.toml`)

The ARG001 ignore is properly configured for FastAPI dependency injection patterns:

```toml
[tool.ruff.lint]
ignore = [
    "E501",   # line too long (handled by black)
    "B008",   # do not perform function calls in argument defaults
    "B904",   # raise from
    "ARG001", # unused function argument (false positive for FastAPI dependencies)
]
```

### Frontend ESLint Configuration (`/home/pbrown/Novus-db/frontend/eslint.config.js`)

The shadcn/ui and hooks exclusion is properly configured:

```javascript
// Disable HMR warning for shadcn/ui components and hook files (standard patterns)
{
  files: ["src/components/ui/**/*.tsx", "src/hooks/**/*.tsx"],
  rules: {
    "react-refresh/only-export-components": "off",
  },
},
```
